The following appears to be a bug. Please evaluate.

I have a simple program that writes <input type="text" name="nitin" value="bhutani"> continously without any line breaks. The issue seems to be that httpd-2 automatically inserts a line break after writing 32k data due to which the above code displays a textbox instead of not displaying anything at all.
